pr_title: tS3Connection setPathStyleAccess for better MinIO support

timeline.message:
Added a checkbox under Advanced settings of tS3Connection when a custom endpoint is used.
When MinIO is used via DNS/hostname this must be checked otherwise the operations fail.

timeline.bodyText:
When USE_REGION_ENDPOINT is unchecked and PATHSTYLEACCESS is checked.
This should not be generated. but currently I think the .enablePathStyleAccess() would be generated.
Please check this.
timeline.author: jzhao-talend

replies.bodyText: I've added the useRegionEndpoint this way PathStyle is ignored if the custom region is not set.
replies.author: bgunics-talend

timeline.message: PathStyleAccess should only be used if a custom endpoint is enabled.
